plot: Alan Davies looks back at the British social history of the 1980s using his own experiences growing up as a teenager in the decade.
plot_en: Alan Davies looks back at the British social history of the 1980s using his own experiences growing up as a teenager in the decade.
plot_es: Alan Davies looks back at the British social history of the 1980s using his own experiences growing up as a teenager in the decade.
title: Alan Davies' Teenage Revolution
